summary:
────────────────────────────────
**Summary**
• Justin Sun’s wallet blacklisted by World Liberty Financial.
• $107M in WLFI frozen, no reason given, just *poof* gone.
• Sun’s team is pissed, calling it a “reckless” move.

Impact — This shit could tank WLFI’s price or spark a full-blown crypto war.

────────────────────────────────
Link: https://www.coindesk.com/tech/2025/09/04/world-liberty-financial-blacklists-justin-sun-s-address-with-usd107m-wlfi
